title.rendered: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 256GB Midnight Green (Renewed)

content.rendered:
Size Name:6.5″ | Colour Name:Midnight Green

All iPhone 11 Pro Max models have a haptic-touch capable 6.5″ (diagonal) OLED “Super Retina XDR” show (2688×1242, 458 ppi, 2,000,000:1 distinction ratio) that occupies practically your entire entrance of the gadget. It has 4 cameras. On the entrance — tucked within the “notch” — is a “TrueDepth” digicam that along with supporting “Advanced Face ID” identification performance, takes 12 megapixel images, shoots 4K video, and has software program help for Portrait mode, Portrait lighting, and extra. The rear packs three 12 megapixel, 4K video-capable cameras — a Ultra Wide (f/2.4 aperture, 120-degree subject of view), Wide (f/1.8 aperture), and Telephoto (f/2.0 aperture) cameras. In addition to enhancements on HDR and portrait mode provided by earlier iPhones, the iPhone 11 Pro additionally provides a Night Mode. The iPhone 11 Pro Max makes use of a chrome steel case and has a glass back and front. It is splash, water, and dust-resistant to the IP68 commonplace (most depth of 4 meters as much as half-hour). It is obtainable in 4 coloration choices — Gold, “Space Gray,” Silver, and (*11*) Internally, the iPhone 11 Pro Max is powered by a 64-bit, 7 nm 2.66 GHz “Apple A13 Bionic” processor with six cores — two efficiency cores and 4 high-efficiency cores — and a “third-generation Neural Engine.” It has 4 GB of RAM and 64 GB, 256 GB, or 512 GB of flash storage. It additionally helps 802.11ax Wi-Fi 6 with 2×2 MIMO, Gigabit-class LTE with 2×2 MIMO, Bluetooth 5.0, Ultra Wideband “for spatial awareness,” NFC for Apple Pay, “Express Cards with power reserve” for appropriate transit methods, and twin SIMs (one {hardware} nano SIM and one software-based eSIM). Apple estimates that the iPhone 11 Pro Max supplies “up to” 80 hours of audio playback, 20 hours of video playback, and 12 hours of streamed video playback. It helps “wireless” (inductive) charging, too (Qi).

Make certain this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
6.5-inch Super Retina XDR OLED show
Water and mud resistant (4 metres for as much as half-hour, IP68)
Triple-camera system with 12MP Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras; Night mode, Portrait mode, and 4K video as much as 60fps
12MP TrueDepth entrance digicam with Portrait Mode, 4K video, and Slo-Mo
Face ID for safe authentication and Apple Pay
A13 Bionic chip with third-generation Neural Engine
